website_summaries.verdict: Though its lens isn't as wide and suffers from many of the same lens artifacts as its competitors, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H50 is a good megazoom camera with a lot of features for experiment-minded snapshooters.
pros: Versatile mix of ease-of-use features and manual controls
cons: no raw support or hot shoe

customer_reviews.title: A good used camera
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Sony DSC H9 that I have taken 40K images with, plumb wore it out!!!! I'm too cheap to buy a new one and this H50 is pretty much the evolution of the H9. It seems to work as designed but it is a bare bones purchase....no card, instructions just the battery, camera, remote and strap. Which is how it was advertised. I downloaded the instructions from Sony and the cards I used in the H9 work in this one too. The shipping was weak....I would have protected the camera better.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Shotwell

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSCH50
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. We use it for sports events. The first and second shot response is terific to catch the rapid activity of soccer, lacrosse, and swimming. For the first time we are able to use the zoom while shooting movies. The stability system allows us to zoom across the field or pool and get stable movies. With the rapid continuous shooting mode we were able to get clear photos of player movement to improve strokes and dives for competition swimming. I have some trouble operating the jog control. But my wife has no problem with her smaller fingers and by using her fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this camera. It's taken some great pictures! I'd been buying the $100 cheapo ones but trying to get a photo of my active 2-year old was impossible! With this camera, I haven't had a problem, I even have one picture of him running flat out, both feet off the ground, and he's not blurry at all. I highly recommend this camera. I'm still playing with the manual settings, like aperature and shutter speed, but even those are fairly simple to learn since the readouts are right there on the screen. Highly, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Chronister

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Sony DSCH5 with 7.2 MP and am very pleased with this camera. I used it at our annual holiday party and got great shots. Having a remote is a real bonus for group shots that include me. I am used to having nightshot capability which I didn't have with the H5. This one has it and now I can take shots of our pond in the Spring with the frogs & toads serenading with their little throats throbbing. Taking video is great too. I would highly recommend this camera. It's small enough to carry with me most of the time and get those unexpected shots otherwise missed.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Ingher

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber Shot DSCH50
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to use and FUN camera. This is my first digital camera. I have always been a film type so when I started using this camera I was not at all intimidated. I enjoy the option of manual v. program and well as the view finder rather than only the view screen. I would like to be able to have interchangeable lens but that wasn't going to stop me from buying this camera. This camera is fun and easy first step into the digital world of photography. Now all I need to master is the software to manipulate the images.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Classy Camera
customer_reviews.text: Sony Cyber-shot DSCH50 is the superb camera. Easy of use, fair battery life, large, clear and adjustable display. Very good Carl Zeiss lens with 15x optical zoom. Liked Double Anti-Blur solution. Face Detection is good, although I don't see myself using this option much. Very good image stabilization. Macro mode is great. Very bright flash. Upto 16GB expandable memory. Remote control is a new good stuff they have provided and it works well. Super zoom lens are available accessories for this camera. Overall this is an amazing device.
customer_reviews.author: Amod

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really an amatuer at photography, but I do like to take pictures as a hobby. I was using a Nikon Coolpix 8200. It was good for family pictures of days at the park, but I really needed something that I could get a good zoom with and detail. I shopped for a long time and settled on the H50. It's everything that I need. It takes awesome pics without having to put a lot of thought into it. It is just about the perfect medium between SLR and point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: good cam
customer_reviews.text: good camera. i'm a little disappointed in low light and in processor speed. Pics in low light are grainy and if you want a shot instantly to catch a particular moment you have to guess how far ahead to push the button. The lag time is unacceptable for a camera of this quality and technology. BUT, in good light this camera takes excellent shots and the zoom/stabilization works really well. You can freehand some really good shots at 15x zoom for an affordable point-N-shoot with factory settings, that's outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera. I've shot beautiful pictures since getting this. The seller described it as being in "good" condition. However to me it looks like new. It came with all the accessories and even a carrying bag. The only downside to this camera is the battery life. I feel like I have to shut it off after every picture I take so it won't die quickly.. However it's a great camera. It even comes with editing options so you can enhance your photos.
customer_reviews.author: catalina cabello

customer_reviews.title: An amazing camera all around
customer_reviews.text: An amazing camera all around, the frame quality, video/camera settings are amazing and will make a great recording camera for starting out on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Mike King

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this new camera. I had a Sony at one time then went to a Kodak with the bigger LCD screen but the pictures on the Kodak do not compare to the quality and sharpness of this Sony. I was not happy that the date does not show up on the pictures, but it is very simple to add it on the computer. As soon as my daughter saw this new camera, she bought one too.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom, great macro
customer_reviews.text: I'm been using this camera for 6 months, and I really likes the quality of pictures taken. When I use the full zoom the clarity on the LCD screen and the capability to move it in different angles is very useful above all in light conditions. Macro options also is amazing because the picture have pro quality. If you want to take wildlife, specially birds, I'll recomend use in sports mode + continous shoots. I'm very satisfied with this camera. Highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: A great camera for just about anything you want to use it for!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I have an old Sony DSC-H3 so the batteries, cards, chargers work with the H50. Used it to take photos at the 50th Idaho Saddle Club Omoksee and it worked well. I have not posted photos yet, but will soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this my daughter who was starting college as a photography major. This is a great first camera. She has had it for about 3 years now and still loves it. Great purchase and will defintely purchase from this shop again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera; buy here and you save money. it was delivered to wrong residence at first and Amazon was more than willing to send another one, no questions asked! But thankfully it was found and delivered following day. I am extremely satisfied! This is a GREAT camera!
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC H50 is one super camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera for about one week, and I am amazed at the super pictures it takes, even under high magnification! Most pics taken on full auto, with great results. Hesitated to buy after reading some reviews, but thrilled that I did. Complaint about fringing with wide angle attachment makes no sense, why not buy a DSLR. This camera fills it's niche very well!
customer_reviews.author: Skyking129

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. An effective camera which is very easy to use. Picture quality is very good. I was particularly pleased with Amazon's shipping as the product reached me 2 days before it was expected to reach.I would recommend this camera to all intermediate users who do not want to move for a DSLR but want a good camera which takes real good pictures. Has got an excellent night mode shoot. Overall rating: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Intellix

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product used almost three years ago and have been enjoying it fully since. It came complete with many accessories and I have had no troubles with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great, excellent pictures, I love it. for the price its a really good deal, not as small as a pocket size camera but size vs price, its on par with more expensive cameras.
customer_reviews.author: GeeeSus C

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was asking for in a camera,really love the continuous shot mode up to 100 shots.The software seems pretty useless but you really don't need to use it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: takes good pictures
customer_reviews.text: purchased this as a gift for someone and they have sent me somke very good pictures....they said it was easy to use.....
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSCH50 9.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: What a geat camera! The zoom feature is really a plus. And the pictures are very clear. We find another great feature everytime we use it. This camera comes with the best download program we have ever had. Would highly recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PJDCHIPS

customer_reviews.title: Sony dsch 50 with 15 zoom
customer_reviews.text: The first item that should be addressed is the fact that this is a Sony. Not a whole lot more should be said. The large tilting screen is a very nice bouns, particularly when shooting wild life, birds, and flowers. Sure you might get a little shake with the extended zoom, but then the stability issue is taken care of with another of the selling features of this camera. After all it is a digital camera you can take as many pictures as you want without wasting film, and you can instantly see what you have. My one thought is to buy a extra battery, with all the bells and whistles your're going to need one.
customer_reviews.author: Deliliah J. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: Is a excelent camera, I enjoy use it. The 15x camera zoon works very well and the camera have a lot diferents funtions than make you take a profesional photos. I like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Castro Rojas

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Sony DSC-H50 Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I used to own the DSC-H5, but decided to upgrade to the DSC-H50. I like the new features! It has a night shot switch that lets you take pictures in the dark! It uses night vision technology. The DSC-H5 has 7.2 MP and 12X zoom. This one has 9 MP and 15X zoom. Buy this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Mike J. Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Good choice, good camera but limitation to deliver to Latinamerica, so I had to ask for delivery to Miami and then find somebody to bring it to Venezuela, it would be good to solve this issue Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend. They loved it, used it quite a bit. At the time they did their research, and this did exactly what they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new camera. I have the smaller Sony that is great to throw in your purse. Both have the Carl Zeiss lens that takes incredibly sharp shots. I rarely have to fix a photo. I bought the DSCH50 for the stronger zoom and I am again amazed at the quality and price of the Sony cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Santonas

customer_reviews.title: If you want a view finder, forget it!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be brief, I wanted a portable camera but I need a viewfinder esp in sunney weather. The back LCD viewfinder is OK but like all I've seen suck in sunlight. The Through the Lens view finder sucks to the point I would return the product if it wern't such a pain in the butt. This camera is third party vendor so not so easy to deal with as direct Amazon purchase. Would not do it AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot 9.1 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed from the first photo. Takes great pictures even when in motion and not using the sports mode. This is just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Pizá V.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pics. zoom works good but it eats the batteries wish it used AA I would recommend except for the battery issue.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want in a camera...
customer_reviews.text: ...and more. Not being a trained photographer, but still wanting a nice, simple camera, this one is the perfect balance. The zoom is great, it's intuitive to use and has great features overall. While the DSLRs are getting cheaper, I recommend this one if you're not a seasoned photgrapher, as it's so simple yet powerful.
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fun Photo, lots to read
customer_reviews.text: Does a lot of wonderful stuff. I just have to learn how. A friend has one and her pictures turn out great. Even pictures taken at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: G. Goerlinger

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to learn how to use it
customer_reviews.text: Camera is good, but the manual is extremely complicated. It will take months to learn how to use all options. I have this camera for more than one year and still can use it only in fully automated mode because I don't know how to use most of options. I tried to learn, but forgot very quickly. And, in fully automated mode my camera produces average quality, blurry pictures when I take them inside of my house. I am planning to sell it and buy something else which is much easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Garik Syhoi

customer_reviews.title: Great Digital Camera / Steady shot Great.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money,every penny.In General dose a great job.Any one taking Digital pictures it dose a wonderful all around job taking snap shots. Sony did a good job on this one. I feel this is a must,and enjoy this camera. Ramboe
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-range camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fabulous! Completely met expectations. One of the ONLY cameras with a remote shutter release. Powerful features for the amateur photographer looking for a great camera at a mid-range price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for sports shots.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera that was easy to operate and be able to take photos of my sons playing soccer. This model was recommened to me by a friend. I have been very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Filby

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary camera. Excelente zoom mix between optical &  digital and lens size
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with it that haven't consider changing it regardless it's 9.1m pixels resolution. With this camera you don't need more
customer_reviews.author: Jose Candano

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I have an H-7 and with the extras this camera has, I have absolutely fell in love with the camera. Best camera to have if you cannot afford a true SLR... Love it...
customer_reviews.author: BJsView

customer_reviews.title: Great camara
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for Christmas and I like it so far. It takes great pictures, I think I need to know the camera better, I am an amateur. So far so good, simple, elegant,has a good price, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: juanpabloleon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: really worth the money. am writing this review a bit late so there might be lastest models from sony. as far as this product is concerned; it's solid
customer_reviews.author: smartV

customer_reviews.title: NO GO ON VIDEO
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sony H50 digital camera. I'm disabled and my hand shakes, yet with 15x telephoto and motion stabilization, i can take sharp pictures without the need for a tripod. BUT...you CANNOT make a video longer than 10 minutes. And that 10-minute time CANNOT be changed. Seems Sony has done this on its newer digital cameras to make you buy a cam corder if you want to do videos longer than 10 minutes. Sony's older digital point-and-shoot cameras can do videos longer than ten minutes. But love this camera! Check out this great shot of moon i took using 30-power digital+optical zoom with camera on tripod and using remote shutter release: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Mauro

customer_reviews.title: my new paparazzi
customer_reviews.text: It's everything and then some! It's better than the one I had previously. This one has better features and a lot easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gumbs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Mom, and she loves it: great pictures without being so complicated that you need an advanced degree to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression
customer_reviews.text: As an amateur photographer, the cybershot dsc h50 looks to be and has everything I need feature wise to make my photo taking better and more enjoyable. Good value for the dollars spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Camera, very easy to use,great pictures... wish i would have bought it before i wasted money on others!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E. Christo

customer_reviews.title: Sony Digital
customer_reviews.text: I received my new Cyberrshot from Sony via Amazon the beginning of April. I keep discovering things it is able to do. I had needed a maximum zoom and had needed having no delay when you press to shoot and this camera has both. I am enjoying having a battery that has a charger that can be plugged in. I plan on taking many more shots exploring the capabilities of this camera
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, amazing quality of image, is a great product, easy to use and carry. The shipment was very fast i have no complains !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Encina

customer_reviews.title: More features
customer_reviews.text: This camera delivered a faster lag time and more zoom to get up close. It has more features then I am used to and so it will take me time to learn how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff-User

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for a couple of weeks now and I think it is fantastic. Pictures are clear and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Why not Slr
customer_reviews.text: It is a good camara. I still wonder if I woulsd be better with an SLR.
customer_reviews.author: H. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from a 2 mega pixel canon. We are point and shoot photographers who just tinker with the features. We are very pleased with this camera. Clear pictures, great features. Still figuring them all out.
customer_reviews.author: jenpt8

customer_reviews.title: basic review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a gift for my dad. So far he seems to be able to handle it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: It's good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera, but the images are better in the camera than the computer. The stabilization of images is not good too. Also the quality of the picture is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Piedrahita

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, however you need to practice how to use it professionally. very good zoom and awesome High definition video recording!!
customer_reviews.author: NGasab

customer_reviews.title: SONY CYBERSHOT DSCH50
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST CAMERAS I EVER OWNED. CAME IN EXCELLENT PACKAGING AND I HAVE NO COMPLAINTS. I REALLY LIKE THE PRICE AND JUST GLAD THAT IT WAS ON AMAZON. IT ALSO TOOK EXCELLENT PICTURES IN THE RAIN. BUT BE CAREFUL. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT TO ALL CAMERA LOVERS.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Armstrong

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSCH50 9.1 MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot
product_meta.description: Smile Shutter technology captures smiles.Super SteadyShot optical image stabilization .HD Photo Viewing capabilit. Face Detection controls flash/focus/exposure/white bal.15x optical zoom/30x digital zoom.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars174 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
